element.title: data_stampa_domanda
element.Formula: from Products.CMFPlomino.PlominoUtils import Now,DateToString return DateToString(Now(),'%d/%m/%Y')

element.title: comune_value
element.Formula: elenco = context.getParentDatabase().resources.customscripts.getElencoComuni() comune_val = 'NON Trovato' for el in elenco: v=el.split('|') if v[1]==context.getItem('iol_comune'): comune_val = v[0] return comune_val

element.title: invio_pec
Data avvio procedimento
element.HTMLAttributesFormula:
ss = ''' data-datepicker-options='{"changeMonth": true, "changeYear": true, "minDate":"-110Y", "dateFormat": "dd/mm/yy", "yearRange": "-10:+10"}' ''' if context.getItem('IOL_AVVIOPROC'): ss = 'readonly ' + ss
return ss

element.title: allegati_istanza
element.Formula: db=context.getParentDatabase() elenco_campi = context.getParentDatabase().resources.customscripts.getElencoAllegati() result = list() for row in elenco_campi: fieldValue = context.getItem(row[1],{}) if fieldValue!={}: titolo=row[0] names=[] for name in fieldValue.keys(): names.append(name) result.append("%s: %s" %(titolo,', '.join(names))) return result
